updated_cases.title: Verify default behavior when urlc_lookup_api_enabled is not exist
updated_cases.custom_summary: Verify default behavior when urlc_lookup_api_enabled is not exist
updated_cases.custom_preconds: The feature flag is not exist in tenant config
updated_cases.custom_steps:
Check tenant feature config does not have urlc_lookup_api_enabled
Send bulk url lookup request
updated_cases.custom_expected:
- swg-api-service successfully detects the feature flag change.
- swg-api-service should not allow caller to do url lookup
- Response 403

updated_cases.title: Verify when urlc_lookup_api_enabled feature flag is set to 1, user is allowed to call the URL lookup API
updated_cases.custom_summary: Verify when urlc_lookup_api_enabled feature flag is set to 1, user is allowed to call the URL lookup API
updated_cases.custom_preconds: The feature flag for urlc_lookup_api_enabled  is initially "0"
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Set the feature flag "1" by provisioner
2. Check swg-api-service load the config file(swg-api-service will call priovisioner by api instead of load file)
3. Send bulk url lookup request
updated_cases.custom_expected:
- swg-api-service successfully detects the feature flag change.
- swg-api-service should allow caller to do url lookup

updated_cases.title: Verify when urlc_lookup_api_enabled feature flag is set to 0, user is not allowed to call the URL lookup API
updated_cases.custom_summary: Verify when urlc_lookup_api_enabled feature flag is set to 0, user is not allowed to call the URL lookup API
updated_cases.custom_preconds: The feature flag for urlc_lookup_api_enabled is initially "1"
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Set the feature flag "0" by provisioner
2. Check swg-api-service load the config file
3. Send bulk url lookup request
updated_cases.custom_expected:
- swg-api-service successfully detects the feature flag change.
- swg-api-service should not allow caller to do url lookup
- Response 403

updated_cases.title: Verify when urlc_lookup_api_enabled feature flag is set to empty
updated_cases.custom_summary: Verify when urlc_lookup_api_enabled feature flag is set to empty
updated_cases.custom_preconds: The feature flag for urlc_lookup_api_enabled is initially "1"
updated_cases.custom_steps:

updated_cases.title: Verify default behavior when advanced_urlc_enabled is not exist, the tenantâ€™s rate limit will be 1000 configured in values
updated_cases.custom_summary: Verify default behavior when advanced_urlc_enabled is not exist, the tenantâ€™s rate limit will be 1000 configured in values
updated_cases.custom_preconds: The feature flag for urlc_lookup_api_enabled is "1"
updated_cases.custom_steps:
Check swg-api-service load the config file
Send bulk url lookup request
updated_cases.custom_expected:
- swg-api-service successfully detects the feature flag change.
- swg-api-service should allow caller to do url lookup
- the rate limit is 1000, indicate in the response header.

updated_cases.title: Verify when advanced_urlc_enabled feature flag is set to invalid value
updated_cases.custom_summary: Verify when advanced_urlc_enabled feature flag is set to invalid value
updated_cases.custom_preconds: The feature flag for urlc_lookup_api_enabled is "1"
updated_cases.custom_steps:

updated_cases.title: Verify the Transaction Event with x-action and x-action-reason with SSL handshake error
updated_cases.custom_summary: Verify the Transaction Event with x-action and x-action-reason with SSL handshake error
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Modified proxymap on nsgw service
2. This will make NSClient will failed at SSL tunneling
3. This will show the SSL tunneling  error on Clinet side
4. TEv4 fields should shown as expected result
updated_cases.custom_expected:
x-action: block
x-action-reason: error-ssl-client
x-policy-action: NotChecked
x-policy-name: ""
x-ssl-policy-action: <Orthogonal>
x-ssl-policy-name: ""
x-error: client-ssl
x-cs-ssl-engine-action: Block/Bypass per error settings
x-sr-ssl-engine-action: Block/Bypass per error settings

updated_cases.title: Verify the Transaction Event with x-action and x-action-reason with DNS Resolution Error
updated_cases.custom_summary: Verify the Transaction Event with x-action and x-action-reason with DNS Resolution Error
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Removed DNS resolution of Proxy on NSGW
2. This will make NSClient cannot be connected 
3. This will show the DNS resolution error on Clinet side
4. TEv4 fields should shown as expected result
updated_cases.custom_expected:
x-action:
x-action-reason: 
x-policy-action: 
x-policy-name: ""
x-ssl-policy-action:
x-ssl-policy-name: ""
x-error: dns
x-cs-ssl-engine-action: <Orthogonal>
x-sr-ssl-engine-action: <Orthogonal>
